snippet: Shareholders of CVR Energy, the oil refiner that Carl C. Icahn has offered to buy for $2.6 billion, have tendered about 55 percent of the outstanding shares, according to a statement by the activist investor.
abstract: Shareholders of CVR Energy, the oil refiner that Carl C. Icahn has offered to buy for $2.6 billion, have tendered about 55 percent of the outstanding shares, according to a statement by the activist investor.

headline.main: Icahn Claims Victory in CVR Fight
